article.title: Multiple Companies to Rapidly Develop Cyber Technologies
article.text: Assured Information Security Inc., Rome, New York (FA8750-12-D-0002); CACI Technologies Inc., Chantilly, Virginia (FA8750-12-D-0005); Global InfoTek Inc., Reston, Virginia (FA8750-12-D-0003); Harris Corp., Herndon, Virginia (FA8750-12-D-0006);Â L-3 National Security Solutions Inc., Reston, Virginia (FA8750-12-D-0007); and Radiance Technologies Inc., Huntsville, Alabama (FA8750-12-D-0004), have been awarded a combined $200,000,000 basic contract modification for additional in-scope activities. Contractor will provide rapid development, prototyping, demonstration, evaluation and transition of cyber capabilities. Work will be performed at Rome, New York; Chantilly, Virginia; Reston, Virginia; Herndon, Virginia; and Huntsville, Alabama, and is expected to be complete by January 31, 2019. The Air Force Research Laboratory, Rome, New York, is the contracting activity.
